title: Upgrading/Conversion
content:
Upgrading/Conversion

State Regulations
§ 255.551 - Scope
§ 255.552 - Notification requirements
§ 255.553 - General requirements
§ 255.555 - Upgrading to a pressure of 125 psig (862 kpa) or more in steel pipelines
§ 255.557 - Upgrading to a pressure less than 125 psig (862 kpa)
§ 255.559 - Conversion to service subject to this part

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
